message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $135?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  How about we settle at $135?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $132? I'm willing to pay that for the product.
